question: Which data science professionals have been active on Twitter discussing trends in big data analytics while being employed at companies with major IT partnerships?

subtasks.task: Identify data science professionals active on Twitter discussing big data analytics. [PersonaTwitterTweets, PersonaTwitterProfile]
Find companies that have major IT partnerships. [CompanyITPartnerDetail]
Filter the identified professionals to those employed at the companies with IT partnerships. [CompanyITPartnerDetail]
